issue.title: Improve getfeature on leaflet
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When using a geatFeature with leaflet we have to choose the interrogation layer.
This enhancement propose to query all layers at once and display the results grouped by type.


**Fixed versions :** 4.5.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves
